author: wn.com
title: South Carolina Disaster Recovery Centers Open in Columbia and Lexington (FEMA - Federal Emergency Management ...
text: ( Source : FEMA - Federal Emergency Management Agency ) COLUMBIA, S.C. - Two disaster recovery centers are open in Columbia and Lexington to help South Carolina flood survivors. The centers are open 8 a.m. to 7 p.m. seven days a week.
